description: This file appears to be a BitBake recipe or part of a build configuration for building a cross-compiler package of gcc (gcc-cross-canadian). It defines dependencies, build steps, environment variables, and packaging instructions for the cross-compiler tailored for a specific target architecture, likely within a Yocto/OpenEmbedded build environment.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Sets environment variables for compiler, linker, assembler, etc., and runs configuration step.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Runs make commands to build the host and target libraries, including specific cleanup and setup steps.
